QuestionBank.question:
In a lightning strikes, what does the stepped leader do?
A) It steps up the voltage like a transformer
B) It produces a flickering that you can see by eye
C) It is a luminescent sphere of plasma that expands step by step
D) It is part of the lightning that makes the bright flash and thunder
E) It makes the first electrical connection between the cloud and ground

The location of greatest lightning frequency in the world is?
A) Alberta Canada
B) Oklahoma
C) Florida
D) Central Africa
E) Southern China
